column2: For centuries the temple of Balzor lay condemned...
Til one day, when a lone acolyte came...
Seeking the dark desires of their heart...

Another mortal come to grasp 
at a fragment of my power...
I shall grant you one wish!

But first, you must bring me at least
eight [color=#124e89]Science Crystals

To aid you, I have created [color=#68386c]Spatial Abberations[/color]
spread throught my temple.
Go on, get out of here!
Congratulations, You did the bare minimum...

Very well. I shall look into your soul and 
determine your heart's wish!

And so the dark acolyte left unfufilled
of their desire...
